transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji sir, call lijiye.
Customer: Aisa hai sir, bilkul short mein ek cheez main aapko keh chuka hu, ye adjusted amount aage star iska sabka humko matlab nahi pata hota hai kyunki hum kapde ke vyapar mein saaf suthri bhasha mein baat karke saaf suthra kaam karte hain.
Thik hai na sir? Aapke employee ne humko ek hi baat kahi hai teen
saal ka aapko subscription milega aur mere ye puchne aur kehne par ki mera purana subscription jab tak ka hai waha tak ka pura hone ke baad humko naya subscription milega yahi cheez unhone accept ki hai.
Ab adjusted amount wo bar bar aap khud chat padhiye usme likh raha hai sir humne apne head authority se bahut mushkil se baat karke aapka ye sinen aapka ye scheme nakki kiya hai sir.
Aap pehle customer hai jinko hum is tarike se teen saal ka subscription is rate mein de rahe hain.
Ye sari cheeze usne words mein likhi hai to iska matlab kya hota hai sir?
Ab ye do star laga diye sir ye star wali bhasha kapde ke vyapar mein hum logo ne nahi ki aur na humko pata hai. Accha jab jaban se hum ye baat kar chuke hain.
To uske baad ye star aur adjust discount aur ye sari cheeze dekhne ki matlab nahi rehti hai na?
Uske baad aap hamari call recording check kar lijiye us bande ki jo bhi hamari call hui hai.
Aap wo check kar lijiye uske baad jo aapko decision lena ho wo aap le lijiye uske liye mujhse discuss karne ki aapko wapas jarurat nahi hai sir.
I have in a very short and sweet language I have told you sir.
Meri iske alava us bande se koi baat nahi hui hai aur uske baad bhi agar aap apne jhuthe employee ko cover karne ke liye aage do star lagane wali baat karte hain.
To ye waste aur fake hai sir.
Ye do star wali bhasha kapde ke vyapar mein nahi hoti hai sir.
Hum us do star ka matlab kahan samajhne jayenge sir?
Hello
Hello
summary:
Concerns:

- Regarding adjusted amount and star mark in subscription.

- Employee promised new subscription after old one ends.

- Objects to the use of star marks in business.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to check call recordings.

- Customer stated he doesn't need to discuss further.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, adjusted amount, star marks, call recording
